quote: Perhaps it's true that all men love their fathers, no matter how terrible the things they do to their sons: there is a part of us that remains forever in debt to those responsible for our existence.
quote_letters: PERHAPS ITS TRUE THAT ALL MEN LOVE THEIR FATHERS NO MATTER HOW TERRIBLE THE THINGS THEY DO TO THEIR SONS THERE IS A PART OF US THAT REMAINS FOREVER IN DEBT TO THOSE RESPONSIBLE FOR OUR EXISTENCE
